puzzles.question: Arrange the fundamental steps in the Letter of Credit (LC) issuance and initial document preparation process.

correctSteps.title: Buyer Applies for LC
correctSteps.description: Buyer submits application for Letter of Credit to Issuing Bank.

correctSteps.title: Issuing Bank Issues LC
correctSteps.description: Issuing Bank reviews application and issues the LC.

correctSteps.title: Advising Bank Advises LC
correctSteps.description: Advising Bank receives and authenticates LC, then advises it to Seller.

correctSteps.title: Seller Ships Goods
correctSteps.description: Seller ships goods as per contract and LC terms.

correctSteps.title: Seller Prepares Documents
correctSteps.description: Seller prepares all required shipping and commercial documents.

shuffledSteps.title: Seller Ships Goods
shuffledSteps.description: Seller ships goods as per contract and LC terms.

shuffledSteps.title: Buyer Applies for LC
shuffledSteps.description: Buyer submits application for Letter of Credit to Issuing Bank.

shuffledSteps.title: Seller Prepares Documents
shuffledSteps.description: Seller prepares all required shipping and commercial documents.

shuffledSteps.title: Advising Bank Advises LC
shuffledSteps.description: Advising Bank receives and authenticates LC, then advises it to Seller.

shuffledSteps.title: Issuing Bank Issues LC
shuffledSteps.description: Issuing Bank reviews application and issues the LC.

puzzles.question: Sequence the events from trade contract signing to the seller's review of the LC.

correctSteps.title: Trade Contract Signed
correctSteps.description: Buyer and Seller agree on trade terms and sign contract.

correctSteps.title: Proforma Invoice Issued
correctSteps.description: Seller issues proforma invoice to Buyer.

correctSteps.title: LC Application Submission
correctSteps.description: Buyer's bank receives LC application.

correctSteps.title: LC Transmission to Advising Bank
correctSteps.description: Issuing bank transmits LC via SWIFT to advising bank.

correctSteps.title: Seller Reviews LC
correctSteps.description: Seller reviews LC terms for acceptability and prepares for shipment.

shuffledSteps.title: LC Application Submission
shuffledSteps.description: Buyer's bank receives LC application.

shuffledSteps.title: Trade Contract Signed
shuffledSteps.description: Buyer and Seller agree on trade terms and sign contract.

shuffledSteps.title: Seller Reviews LC
shuffledSteps.description: Seller reviews LC terms for acceptability and prepares for shipment.

shuffledSteps.title: Proforma Invoice Issued
shuffledSteps.description: Seller issues proforma invoice to Buyer.

shuffledSteps.title: LC Transmission to Advising Bank
shuffledSteps.description: Issuing bank transmits LC via SWIFT to advising bank.

puzzles.question: Order the steps involved in preparing goods and obtaining essential documents for a trade finance shipment.

correctSteps.title: Pre-shipment Inspection
correctSteps.description: Goods undergo inspection before shipment to ensure quality.

correctSteps.title: Bill of Lading Issued
correctSteps.description: Carrier issues Bill of Lading upon loading goods.

correctSteps.title: Commercial Invoice Prepared
correctSteps.description: Seller creates commercial invoice for the goods.

correctSteps.title: Certificate of Origin Obtained
correctSteps.description: Seller obtains Certificate of Origin from relevant authority.

correctSteps.title: Insurance Documents Arranged
correctSteps.description: Seller or Buyer arranges marine insurance as per Incoterms.

shuffledSteps.title: Commercial Invoice Prepared
shuffledSteps.description: Seller creates commercial invoice for the goods.

shuffledSteps.description: Seller or Buyer arranges marine insurance as per Incoterms.

puzzles.question: Sequence the process of document presentation and payment settlement under a Letter of Credit.

correctSteps.title: Documents Presented by Seller
correctSteps.description: Seller presents compliant documents to Advising/Nominated Bank.

correctSteps.title: Bank Examines Documents
correctSteps.description: Advising/Nominated Bank examines documents for compliance.

correctSteps.title: Documents Forwarded to Issuing Bank
correctSteps.description: Compliant documents are sent to the Issuing Bank.

correctSteps.title: Issuing Bank Verifies Documents
correctSteps.description: Issuing Bank verifies documents against LC terms.

correctSteps.title: Issuing Bank Makes Payment
correctSteps.description: Upon verification, Issuing Bank pays the Seller's bank.

shuffledSteps.description: Compliant documents are sent to the Issuing Bank.

shuffledSteps.title: Issuing Bank Makes Payment

shuffledSteps.title: Issuing Bank Verifies Documents

puzzles.question: Order the steps involved in resolving discrepancies in LC documents and the subsequent finalization of the trade.

correctSteps.title: Discrepancy Notified
correctSteps.description: If documents are non-compliant, discrepancies are notified.

correctSteps.title: Seller Rectifies/Buyer Waives
correctSteps.description: Seller corrects documents or Buyer agrees to waive discrepancies.

correctSteps.title: Buyer Pays Issuing Bank
correctSteps.description: Buyer pays Issuing Bank to release documents.

correctSteps.title: Documents Released to Buyer
correctSteps.description: Issuing Bank releases documents to Buyer for goods clearance.

correctSteps.title: Buyer Clears Goods
correctSteps.description: Buyer uses documents to clear goods from customs.

shuffledSteps.description: Issuing Bank releases documents to Buyer for goods clearance.

shuffledSteps.title: Buyer Clears Goods
shuffledSteps.description: Buyer uses documents to clear goods from customs.

shuffledSteps.title: Seller Rectifies/Buyer Waives

puzzles.question: Arrange the final steps in the LC settlement process, including reimbursement and closure.

correctSteps.title: Reimbursement Claim by Nominated Bank
correctSteps.description: Nominated Bank claims reimbursement from Issuing Bank.

correctSteps.title: Reimbursement by Issuing Bank
correctSteps.description: Issuing Bank reimburses the Nominated Bank.

correctSteps.title: Applicant (Buyer) Payment
correctSteps.description: Applicant pays the Issuing Bank for the transaction.

correctSteps.title: Bank Charges Settlement
correctSteps.description: All outstanding bank charges and fees are settled.

correctSteps.title: LC Final Closure
correctSteps.description: The Letter of Credit is officially closed.

puzzles.question: Sequence the typical steps a user would take to lend or borrow assets on a Decentralized Finance (DeFi) lending platform.

correctSteps.title: User Connects Wallet
correctSteps.description: User connects their Web3 wallet to a DeFi lending platform.

correctSteps.title: User Deposits Collateral
correctSteps.description: User deposits crypto assets (e.g., ETH, DAI) as collateral into a smart contract.

correctSteps.title: Platform Calculates Loan Terms
correctSteps.description: DeFi platform calculates available loan amount, interest rate, and liquidation price based on collateral.

correctSteps.title: User Borrows Funds
correctSteps.description: User borrows desired stablecoins or crypto assets against their collateral.

correctSteps.title: Funds Transferred via Smart Contract
correctSteps.description: Borrowed funds are instantly transferred to user's wallet via smart contract.

shuffledSteps.description: DeFi platform calculates available loan amount, interest rate, and liquidation price based on collateral.

puzzles.question: Order the lifecycle of a liquidity provider in a DeFi lending pool.

correctSteps.title: Liquidity Pool Deposit
correctSteps.description: Lender deposits assets into a liquidity pool on a DeFi protocol.

correctSteps.title: Receiving LP Tokens
correctSteps.description: Lender receives Liquidity Provider (LP) tokens representing their share.

correctSteps.title: Accruing Interest
correctSteps.description: Borrowed funds accrue interest, which is distributed to lenders.

correctSteps.title: Borrower Repays Loan
correctSteps.description: Borrower repays the principal and accrued interest.

correctSteps.title: Lender Withdraws Funds
correctSteps.description: Lender redeems LP tokens to withdraw original deposit plus earned interest.

puzzles.question: Arrange the steps for executing a cryptocurrency swap on a Decentralized Exchange (DEX).

correctSteps.title: User Connects Wallet (DEX)
correctSteps.description: User connects their Web3 wallet to a Decentralized Exchange (DEX).

correctSteps.title: Select Trading Pair
correctSteps.description: User selects the cryptocurrency pair they wish to trade (e.g., ETH/DAI).

correctSteps.title: Approve Token Spending
correctSteps.description: User approves the DEX smart contract to spend their tokens (for ERC-20).

correctSteps.title: Submit Trade Order
correctSteps.description: User submits a swap or limit order on the DEX.

correctSteps.title: Smart Contract Executes Swap
correctSteps.description: The smart contract atomically executes the trade against a liquidity pool.

puzzles.question: Sequence the process of providing and managing liquidity on a Decentralized Exchange (DEX).

correctSteps.title: Liquidity Provision
correctSteps.description: User adds equal value of two tokens to a liquidity pool.

correctSteps.title: Receiving LP Tokens
correctSteps.description: User receives liquidity provider (LP) tokens representing their pool share.

correctSteps.title: Earning Trading Fees
correctSteps.description: LP tokens accrue a share of trading fees generated by the pool.

correctSteps.title: Impermanent Loss Monitoring
correctSteps.description: User monitors for impermanent loss due to price divergences.

correctSteps.title: Withdrawing Liquidity
correctSteps.description: User removes their liquidity, receiving their original deposit plus fees (minus impermanent loss).

shuffledSteps.title: Withdrawing Liquidity

puzzles.question: Order the workflow for a standard Invoice Discounting transaction.

correctSteps.title: Supplier Invoices Buyer
correctSteps.description: Supplier delivers goods/services and issues invoice to Buyer.

correctSteps.title: Invoice Submitted to Financier
correctSteps.description: Supplier submits the invoice to a supply chain financier.

correctSteps.title: Financier Verifies Invoice
correctSteps.description: Financier verifies the invoice with the Buyer.

correctSteps.title: Financier Advances Funds
correctSteps.description: Financier provides early payment (discounted) to Supplier.

correctSteps.title: Buyer Pays Financier
correctSteps.description: On due date, Buyer pays the full invoice amount to the Financier.

correctSteps.description: Financier offers a discount rate for early payment to Supplier.

correctSteps.title: Supplier Accepts Early Payment
correctSteps.description: Supplier accepts the discounted early payment from Financier.

puzzles.question: Sequence the workflow for a cross-border payment using the SWIFT network.

correctSteps.title: Sender Initiates Cross-Border Payment
correctSteps.description: Sender initiates a payment to an international recipient.

correctSteps.title: Sender's Bank Sends SWIFT Message
correctSteps.description: Sender's bank sends a SWIFT MT103 (or equivalent) to correspondent bank.

correctSteps.title: Correspondent Bank Routes Payment
correctSteps.description: Correspondent bank(s) process and route payment through international networks.

correctSteps.title: Recipient's Bank Receives Funds
correctSteps.description: Recipient's bank receives funds and FX conversion occurs.

correctSteps.title: Recipient Account Credited
correctSteps.description: Recipient's account is credited with the converted amount.

puzzles.question: Arrange the key activities in a corporate cash management and liquidity workflow.

correctSteps.title: Cash Position Aggregation
correctSteps.description: Treasury gathers real-time cash balances from all bank accounts.

correctSteps.title: Cash Flow Forecasting
correctSteps.description: Predicting future cash inflows and outflows for short-term planning.

correctSteps.title: Liquidity Optimization
correctSteps.description: Moving surplus cash to investment vehicles or funding deficits.

correctSteps.title: Intercompany Lending/Borrowing
correctSteps.description: Managing cash movements between different entities within a group.

correctSteps.title: Daily Reconciliation
correctSteps.description: Reconciling bank statements with internal records at end of day.

puzzles.question: Order the process of managing foreign exchange (FX) risk within treasury operations.

correctSteps.description: Executing FX derivatives with financial institutions.

correctSteps.description: Daily valuation of hedging instruments to assess effectiveness.

correctSteps.description: Settlement of hedging contracts at maturity.

puzzles.question: Arrange the steps in a typical factoring or invoice purchasing process.

correctSteps.title: Goods/Services Delivered & Invoiced
correctSteps.description: Seller provides goods/services and invoices the customer.

correctSteps.title: Invoice Sale to Factor
correctSteps.description: Seller sells the invoice (receivable) to a factoring company (factor).

correctSteps.title: Advance Payment by Factor
correctSteps.description: Factor pays the seller an agreed-upon percentage of the invoice value upfront.

correctSteps.title: Customer Payment to Factor
correctSteps.description: On the invoice's due date, the customer pays the full amount directly to the factor.

correctSteps.title: Rebate of Reserve to Seller
correctSteps.description: Factor pays the remaining balance to the seller, less fees, once customer pays.
